title: Custom Character Designer
description: Customize facial features, body shape, hairstyles, and more with this extensive, high-quality character designer. Comes animation compatible and with a fully functioning user interface.
longDescription:
MAJOR UPDATE! Female has been added to the pack. There has been some changes to the Blueprint Structure so this update may impact your project if you attempt to integrate it into an existing project.

Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=Qzdo6lqwPZM

Allow your players to customize their characters in-game! If you liked the character personalization tools found in most classic RPG games and want to replicate them in your own project, this extensive and easy-to-use designer gives you or your players the ability to change anything from general body type to facial features.

4 basic body types form the groundwork for each character. You can also blend between these body types to get a unique appearance. The pack also comes with save slot functionality allowing you to save the settings on your character design.

There are also several hairstyles and they all work for both Genders! You can easily add your own hair since the system uses simple static meshes attached to slots. When the design process is done you can click the “Bake” button to draw all of the blended materials to a single rendertarget that is much cheaper to use. The body materials have been separated by limbs, torso, and head so that you may hide unused body parts for optimization.

The model comes already rigged for animation and is compatible with the Epic skeleton template. The user interface is fully functional and game ready.
technicalDetails:
Update 1 Released!
- Save Slots added you can now save three different characters
- Saves persist after you close the project
- New Scale and height controls added you can now change the size of the character and the length of various limbs
- Fixed some minor bugs with the eye brows clipping

Update 2 Released!
* Added LOD 1 for Character mesh reducing the poly count significantly and still has all of the functional morph targets.
* Playable Demo available
* New Promo Video
* New Wrinkle and Brow adjust controls
* Adjusted UI slightly with new tab and Save complete notification

Update 3 Released!
* Added Female character and new gender specific options.
* Female comes with all same morph features of male.
* Adjusted UI slightly with new tab and Save complete notification

Update 4 Released!
* Added "Done" Feature: Click the "Done" Button to automatically import the character into a third person template game. You can copy and past the example character blueprint script for a speedy way to integrate the feature into your own project!

Please leave feedback on what changes you would like in the next update and ask questions on this forum thread.

Scaled & Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes
Animated: Yes
Package includes: Two Skeletal assets (Male/Female) with 30+ Facial morph targets and 3 body type morphs
Triangle count: 39320 (LOD 0 Male) 22837 (LOD0 Female) 10466 (LOD1 Male)
Textures: Diffuse, normal
Texture resolution: 2k-1k
Documents included: No
Intended platform: Desktop
